solution.text:
\(x-y = _{j}_\)
\(\Rightarrow (x-y)^2 = _{{j**2}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow x^2 + y^2 - 2xy = (_{{j**2}}_)\)
\(\Rightarrow x^2 + y^2 = (_{{j**2}}_) + 2xy\)
Since \(xy = _{k}_\)
\(\Rightarrow x^2 + y^2 = (_{{(j**2)}}_)+(_{{(2*k)}}_)\)
\(\Rightarrow x^2 + y^2 = _{{(j**2)+(2*k)}}_\)

content.text: If \(x-y=_{j}_\) and \(xy=_{k}_\), find the value of \(x^2 + y^2\)
